modShortDescription: Working slot machine. Uses tokens that are craftable in a "Casino Station". To play on it, hold a token and use Primary Action on the machine.
modDescription:
Working slot machine. Uses tokens that are craftable in a “Casino Station”. To play on it, hold a token and use Primary Action on the machine. To cash out your earnings punch the Casino Station. Should work online.

**Winning combinations:**

* 3 BARs = 10x
* 3 Symbols = 4x
* 2 BARs = 2x
* 1 BAR = 1x (break even)

**[Download](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1mty3NG3-krJp2E1mflCQMpXkRP0oiclA/view?usp=sharing)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/23699-snufkins-slot-machine/).

**Credits:** [Snufkin](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/snufkin/)
